text: The Someșul Cald (Hungarian: Meleg-Szamos; literally "Warm Someș") is the left headwater of the river Someșul Mic in Romania. It joins the Someșul Rece in Lake Gilău, a reservoir near Gilău. The reservoirs Mărișelu, Tarnița and Someșul Cald are located on this river. Construction of the Tarnița – Lăpuștești Hydroelectric Power Station on the river began on June 15, 2008.Work began on the huge Tarnița - Lăpușești Hydropower Plant ==Tributaries== The following rivers are tributaries to the river Someșul Cald: *Left: Ponor, Pârâul Firei, Râșca, Agârbiciu *Right: Bătrâna, Giurcuța, Beliș, Leșul ==References== * Trasee turistice - județul Cluj Category:Rivers of Romania Category:Rivers of Cluj County Category:Rivers of Bihor County
title: Someșul Cald
